How Can You Help?

Put your Pronouns in Your Social Media Bios.

By putting your pronouns in your social media bio, you help defend trans people from being outed and harassed just by stating their preferred pronouns. Sign our campaign to make this a feature of social media platforms.

Support Friends & Be an Ally.

If you're unsure with how you can support friends suffering from mental illness, or how to be a good ally, check the links on our resources page.
